mapper.select: select * from io where epc in(select epc from student_epc where student_id = #{value}) and io_date = (select max(io_date) from io where epc in(select epc from student_epc where student_id = #{value})) and id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM io WHERE epc IN (SELECT epc FROM student_epc WHERE student_id = #{value}))
select count(*) FROM io as theio left join student_epc se on theio.epc=se.epc left join student as stu on stu.id=se.student_id where stu.id= #{studentId}
mapper.insert: insert into io ( epc, io_type, io_date, student_id, cameraNo, verification_code, serial_number, rfid_id ) values ( #{epc}, #{ioType}, #{ioDate}, #{studentId}, #{cameraNo}, #{verificationCode}, #{serialNumber}, #{rfidId} )
